query.sfwSql: SELECT SS.ID, S.SERVER_NAME, SBST.ACTION_METHOD, SS.* FROM SGW_BPM_SERVER_SETTINGS SS WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGS_SERVERS S WITH(NOLOCK) ON S.SERVER_ID = SS.SERVER_ID AND S.SERVER_NAME = @SERVER_NAME INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_SERVICE_TIMER SBST WITH(NOLOCK) ON SS.SERVICE_TIMER_ID = SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID ORDER BY SS.ID
query.sfwOracle: SELECT SS.ID, S.SERVER_NAME, SBST.ACTION_METHOD, SS.* FROM SGW_BPM_SERVER_SETTINGS SS INNER JOIN SGS_SERVERS S ON S.SERVER_ID = SS.SERVER_ID AND S.SERVER_NAME = @SERVER_NAME INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_SERVICE_TIMER SBST ON SS.SERVICE_TIMER_ID = SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID ORDER BY SS.ID
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT SS.ID, S.SERVER_NAME, SBST.ACTION_METHOD, SS.* FROM SGW_BPM_SERVER_SETTINGS SS INNER JOIN SGS_SERVERS S ON S.SERVER_ID = SS.SERVER_ID AND S.SERVER_NAME = @SERVER_NAME INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_SERVICE_TIMER SBST ON SS.SERVICE_TIMER_ID = SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID ORDER BY SS.ID

query.sfwSql: SELECT SS.SERVER_ID, SBST.*, SBSS.* FROM SGW_BPM_SERVICE_TIMER SBST WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_SERVER_SETTINGS SBSS WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID = SBSS.SERVICE_TIMER_ID INNER JOIN SGS_SERVERS SS WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBSS.SERVER_ID = SS.SERVER_ID
query.sfwOracle: SELECT SS.SERVER_ID, SBST.*, SBSS.* FROM SGW_BPM_SERVICE_TIMER SBST INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_SERVER_SETTINGS SBSS ON SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID = SBSS.SERVICE_TIMER_ID INNER JOIN SGS_SERVERS SS ON SBSS.SERVER_ID = SS.SERVER_ID
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT SS.SERVER_ID, SBST.*, SBSS.* FROM SGW_BPM_SERVICE_TIMER SBST INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_SERVER_SETTINGS SBSS ON SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID = SBSS.SERVICE_TIMER_ID INNER JOIN SGS_SERVERS SS ON SBSS.SERVER_ID = SS.SERVER_ID

query.sfwSql: SELECT SBSS.*, SS.SERVER_ID AS SERVER_ID, SS.SERVER_NAME AS SERVER_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_SERVICE_TIMER SBST WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_SERVER_SETTINGS SBSS WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID = SBSS.SERVICE_TIMER_ID INNER JOIN SGS_SERVERS SS WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBSS.SERVER_ID = SS.SERVER_ID
query.sfwOracle: SELECT SBSS.*, SS.SERVER_ID AS SERVER_ID, SS.SERVER_NAME AS SERVER_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_SERVICE_TIMER SBST INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_SERVER_SETTINGS SBSS ON SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID = SBSS.SERVICE_TIMER_ID INNER JOIN SGS_SERVERS SS ON SBSS.SERVER_ID = SS.SERVER_ID
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT SBSS.*, SS.SERVER_ID AS SERVER_ID, SS.SERVER_NAME AS SERVER_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_SERVICE_TIMER SBST INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_SERVER_SETTINGS SBSS ON SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID = SBSS.SERVICE_TIMER_ID INNER JOIN SGS_SERVERS SS ON SBSS.SERVER_ID = SS.SERVER_ID

query.sfwSql: SELECT SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID, SBST.ACTION_METHOD FROM SGW_BPM_SERVER_SETTINGS SS WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_SERVICE_TIMER SBST WITH(NOLOCK) ON SS.SERVICE_TIMER_ID = SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID ORDER BY SS.ID
query.sfwOracle: SELECT SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID, SBST.ACTION_METHOD FROM SGW_BPM_SERVER_SETTINGS SS INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_SERVICE_TIMER SBST ON SS.SERVICE_TIMER_ID = SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID ORDER BY SS.ID
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID, SBST.ACTION_METHOD FROM SGW_BPM_SERVER_SETTINGS SS INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_SERVICE_TIMER SBST ON SS.SERVICE_TIMER_ID = SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID ORDER BY SS.ID
